Class SystemParams

  • java.lang.Object
    • SystemParams

  • public final class SystemParams
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds the system parameters.
    Author:
    braem

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean ACCEPT_USER_INPUT
      Whether or not to select user input.
      static int AGENT_DELAY
      The amount of time the agent delays between actions, in milliseconds.
      static double LAGGING_LENGTH
      How far behind an agent needs to be to be considered lagging.
      static double PERCEPT_LENGTH
      Length of the perception of the agent.
      static boolean SHOW_COMPOSITION_GUI
      Whether or not to show the Composition in a GUI.
      static ViewType VIEW_TYPE 
      static double WHOLE_NOTE_DURATION
      Duration of whole note as dictated by jMusic

    • Field Detail

      • AGENT_DELAY

        public static int AGENT_DELAY
        The amount of time the agent delays between actions, in milliseconds.

      • WHOLE_NOTE_DURATION

        public static final double WHOLE_NOTE_DURATION
        Duration of whole note as dictated by jMusic
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PERCEPT_LENGTH

        public static double PERCEPT_LENGTH
        Length of the perception of the agent. Measured in jMusic note durations.

      • LAGGING_LENGTH

        public static double LAGGING_LENGTH
        How far behind an agent needs to be to be considered lagging. Measured in jMusic note durations. A larger value means that an agent is more likely going to have to make decisions only on their perception, but blocks the other agents less.

      • SHOW_COMPOSITION_GUI

        public static boolean SHOW_COMPOSITION_GUI
        Whether or not to show the Composition in a GUI. NOTE: GUI may not refresh in time if agent delay is not long enough.

      • ACCEPT_USER_INPUT

        public static boolean ACCEPT_USER_INPUT
        Whether or not to select user input.

      • VIEW_TYPE

        public static ViewType VIEW_TYPE

    • Constructor Detail

      • SystemParams

        public SystemParams()
